hanzi-su-wiki:
湧

Значения

Бить (о воде); бурлить; зарождаться

Мнемоника

Кипение как избыток энергии воды 氵, сравнимый с мощью 力 стрелка, пробивающего доски тира насквозь 甬.

Варианты

涌
purpleculture_pinyin:
yǒng
to bubble up; to rush forth
пузыриться; броситься вперед
rtega_mnemonic:
湧湧RSwell up, gush forth, rise, boil
  • water 氵 moving back and forth like fighting men 勇
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 勈 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 勈 [ yǒng ] brave
heisig_chinese_memo: The courageous man who went into the gushing water to save a drowning victim couldn't be seen, except by the air that started to bubble up.
heisig_constituent: bubble up, water, water droplets, water pistol, courageous, courage, chop-seal, hanko, male, rice field, brains, power, muscle, arnold
koohiiStory1: The courageous man who went into the water to save a drowning victim couldn´t be seen, except by the air that bubbled up.
koohiiStory2: Bubble up the WATER and see who has the COURAGE to jump into it.
jp_example_words: 湧く(わく): boil, grow hot, get excited, gush forth
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When you see a tsunami coming courage wells up inside you and you gain the power to save everyone you meet before they get washed away! Feel that courage boil and spread throughout all your limbs. You feel like you have super strength. This tsunami isn't going to hurt anyone while you're alive to stop it!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine what it feels like to have courage well up inside you. Courage in the face of certain death!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Who does that courage well up inside? You (ゆう)! In fact, YOU feel like there is a never ending well of courage bursting out of you now. You are going to be a hero!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Who wells up with courage? You do!
Ru_Radicals: 力 (сила), マ, 汁 (суп), 田 (рисовое поле)
Ru_trainchinese: yǒng: (глаг) литься потоком, хлестать, хлынуть
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the brave (勇) water (氵) gushes
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I thought it would be fun to try a pogo-stick in the pool, but it wasn't exactly thrilling.  The funnest part is when I got out and the water came gush ing out of the inside of the pogo-stick when I started hopping.
humanum_full_description_en: From " water " to " brave " sound. " Yong " is the same as " Yong ", and " Courage " also follows the sound of " Yong ". "Suo Wen" is " Yong ". "Ji Yun. "Swollen rhyme": "Yong, or yong." The original meaning is water rising upwards. Such as "Han Shu. "Wu Emperor Ji": "Autumn and July, earthquakes often spring out." Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "On the way to the mountain spring": "Decisively rise in the cave, splash out the cave door." See " Yong ".
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " brave " sound. " Yong " is the same as " Yong ". The original meaning is that water rises upward.
humanum_full_description: 從「水」，「勇」聲。「湧」同「涌」，「勇」亦從「甬」聲。《說文》作「涌」。《集韻．腫韻》：「涌，或作湧。」本義是水向上冒。如《漢書．武帝紀》：「秋七月，地震，往往湧泉出。」唐代白居易〈途中題山泉〉：「決決湧岩穴，濺濺出洞門。」參見「涌」。
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「勇」聲。「湧」同「涌」，本義是水向上冒。

湧く(わく): boil, grow hot, get excited, gush forth

從「 水 」，「 勇 」聲。「 湧 」同「 涌 」，「 勇 」亦從「 甬 」聲。《說文》作「 涌 」。《集韻．腫韻》：「涌，或作湧。」本義是水向上冒。如《漢書．武帝紀》：「秋七月，地震，往往湧泉出。」唐代白居易〈途中題山泉〉：「決決湧岩穴，濺濺出洞門。」參見「 涌 」。
From " water" to " brave" sound. " Yong" is the same as " Yong", and " Courage" also follows the sound of " Yong". "Suo Wen" is " Yong". "Ji Yun. "Swollen rhyme": "Yong, or yong." The original meaning is water rising upwards. Such as "Han Shu. "Wu Emperor Ji": "Autumn and July, earthquakes often spring out." Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "On the way to the mountain spring": "Decisively rise in the cave, splash out the cave door." See " Yong".

yǒng
вм. 涌
Radicals: 氵, 勇  (tsunami, courage)
Meaning Mnemonic
When you see a tsunami coming courage wells up inside you and you gain the power to save everyone you meet before they get washed away! Feel that courage boil and spread throughout all your limbs. You feel like you have super strength. This tsunami isn't going to hurt anyone while you're alive to stop it!
Imagine what it feels like to have courage well up inside you. Courage in the face of certain death!
Reading Mnemonic
Who does that courage well up inside? You (ゆう)! In fact, YOU feel like there is a never ending well of courage bursting out of you now. You are going to be a hero!
Who wells up with courage? You do!
